LanguageData.RimbodyMuscleTooltip: The amount of muscle. The bar above shows how much muscle the pawn has gained. When they rest, the gain will convert into muscle.
LanguageData.Rimbody_EditModeTooltip: Left-click a field to increase, right-click to decrease
LanguageData.RimbodyGenderDifferenceTooltip: Male pawns are more likely to gain muscle. Female pawns takes 1.5 more fat to appear fat than male pawns.
LanguageData.RimbodyShowFleckTooltip: Show fleck icon when pawns are doing strength or cardio workouts.
LanguageData.RimbodyRateFactorTooltip: The rate factor determines how quickly muscle and fat change. Setting it to 2 will make them change twice as fast, while setting it to 0.5 will halve the speed.
LanguageData.RimbodyFatThreshholdFatTooltip: Above this amount of fat, a pawn will have the Fat body type.
LanguageData.RimbodyFatThresholdThinTooltip: Below this amount of fat, a pawn will have the Thin body type.
LanguageData.RimbodyMuscleThresholdHulkTooltip: Above this amount of muscle, a pawn will have the Hulk body type.
LanguageData.RimbodyMuscleThresholdThinTooltip: Below this amount of muscle, a pawn will have the Thin body type.
LanguageData.RimbodyGracePeriodTooltip: A pawn should have this much muscle/fat more or less than the threshold for their body type to change.
LanguageData.RimbodyNonSenescentpointTooltip: Pawns with Non-senescent genes past this age will be considered having a body of this age.
LanguageData.RimbodyDefaultSettingTooltip: Reset the settings to their default values.
